dmca.title: DMCA notice to Theplanet.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net
[mailto:colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net] 
Posted At: Tuesday, November 07, 2006 3:29 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Re: Dubai Forums Libelous postings
Subject: Re: Dubai Forums Libelous postings


Dear Sirs, further to our earlier exchange of emails today re libelous
postings [see below] Also below is the appropriate detail for you to
track it from the site.

Please now confirm removal by return to avoid the court action.

yours faithfully

Heathcrestlegal Consultants Ltd

----- Forwarded message from beverley@devereandpartners.com -----
     Date: Tue, 7 Nov 2006 09:23:06 +0100
     From: Beverley Yeomans <beverley@devereandpartners.com>
Reply-To: Beverley Yeomans <beverley@devereandpartners.com>
  Subject: Re: AODR Dubai Forums [alittle progress maybe]
       To: colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net, ivan.ciancio@dv-p.com

Hi Colin,

Please start off with the below... I'm sure they'll find the thread that
way.

Regards

Bev





-----Original Message-----
From: Ivan Ciancio [mailto:ivan.ciancio@devereandpartners.com]
Sent: 07 November 2006 09:21 AM
To: 'Beverley Yeomans'
Subject: RE: AODR Dubai Forums [alittle progress maybe]



Hello Bev,



I found 1 post and it had 3 pages. Where there more on dubai forums?



http://www.dubaiforums.com/viewtopic.php?t=1491
<http://www.dubaiforums.com/viewtopic.php?t=1491&postdays=0&postorder=as
c&st
art=0> &postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=0



http://www.dubaiforums.com/viewtopic.php?t=1491
<http://www.dubaiforums.com/viewtopic.php?t=1491&postdays=0&postorder=as
c&st
art=15> &postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=15



http://www.dubaiforums.com/viewtopic.php?t=1491
<http://www.dubaiforums.com/viewtopic.php?t=1491&postdays=0&postorder=as
c&st
art=30> &postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=30



Regards



Ivan Ciancio



Tel.: +356 21 311600



Fax: +356 21 311700







http://www.devereandpartners.com



http://www.deverebrokers.com













-----Original Message-----

From: Beverley Yeomans [mailto:beverley@devereandpartners.com]

Sent: 07 November 2006 09:03 AM

To: colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net

Cc: ivan.ciancio@dv-p.com

Subject: RE: AODR Dubai Forums [alittle progress maybe]



Iv,

This needs to be done ASAP - can u pick out the URL and send it to
Colin?

Thanks

Bev





-----Original Message-----

From: colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net
[mailto:colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net]



Sent: 07 November 2006 05:49 AM

To: nigel.green@devereandpartners.com

Cc: beverley@dv-p.com; ivan.ciancio@dv-p.com

Subject: AODR Dubai Forums [alittle progress maybe]



Below is self explanatory. BEV/IVAN can you supply me with the URL

requested below?



many thanks



regards



colin



----- Forwarded message from colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net -----

      Date: Mon, 06 Nov 2006 20:15:42 -0800

      From: colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net

Reply-To: colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net

   Subject: Re: FW: [EV1-C1623698S] Fwd: Dubai Forums - For the

attention of the Managing Director

        To: Copyright <Copyright@theplanet.com>



The site is simply www.dubaiforums.com. I will ask our head of IT to

furnish the URL



yours faithfully



Heathcrestlegal Consultants Ltd



Quoting Copyright <Copyright@theplanet.com>:



>  Please provide us with the specific URL which is infringing upon your

> company's rights.

>

> Thanks,

> Legal Response Team

>

> -----Original Message-----

> From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net]

> Posted At: Friday, November 03, 2006 11:18 AM

> Posted To: DMCA

> Conversation: [EV1-C1623698S] Fwd: Dubai Forums - For the attention of

> the Managing Director

> Subject: [EV1-C1623698S] Fwd: Dubai Forums - For the attention of the

> Managing Director

>

>

> ==== Forwarded Ticket ====

> 1. Fwd: Dubai Forums - For the attention of the Managing Director 
> Added

> by system at Wednesday, Nov 1 2006 08:24 am

> X-MailFrom: colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net

> X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net

> Received: from [207.218.192.101] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for

> <abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Wed Nov 1 08:24:06 2006

> Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net

>   (SMTP32) id A000008D0; Wed,  1 Nov 2006 08:22:51 -0600

> Received: from mx03.filter.theplanet.com [207.218.221.229] by

> mail.ev1.net with ESMTP

>   (SMTPD32-6.06) id ADBABD670084; Wed, 01 Nov 2006 08:22:50 -0600

> Return-path: <colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net>

> Delivery-date: Wed, 01 Nov 2006 08:23:59 -0600

> Received: from sinope.lunarpages.com ([216.227.215.67])  by

> mx03.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from 
> colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net)

> with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)

>  (Exim)

>  id 1GfH0Y-00094R-TJ; Wed, 01 Nov 2006 08:23:59 -0600

> Received: from cpanel by sinope.lunarpages.com with local (Exim 4.52)

> id 1GfH1n-0005PU-MP; Wed, 01 Nov 2006 06:25:15 -0800

> Received: from 80.227.211.204 ([80.227.211.204]) by

>          login.sinope.lunarpages.com (Horde MIME library) with HTTP; 
> Wed,

> 01 Nov

>          2006 06:25:15 -0800

> Message-ID:

> <20061101062515.jx81wc7n6xsgo8c8@login.sinope.lunarpages.com>

> Date: Wed, 01 Nov 2006 06:25:15 -0800

> From: colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net

> To: noc@ew1.net, abuse@ev1servers.net, admin@ev1.net

> Cc: admin2@ev1.net

> Subject: Fwd: Dubai Forums - For the attention of the Managing 
> Director

> MIME-Version: 1.0

> Content-Type: text/plain;

>          charset=ISO-8859-1;

>          DelSp="Yes";

>          format="flowed"

> Content-Disposition: inline

> Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

> User-Agent: Internet Messaging Program (IMP) H3 (4.1.1)

> X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it

> with any abuse report

> X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - sinope.lunarpages.com

> X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - ev1.net

> X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [32001 502] / [47 12]

> X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - heathcrestlegal.net

> X-Source:

> X-Source-Args:

> X-Source-Dir:

> X-Declude-Sender: colin.barr@heathcrestlegal.net [207.218.221.229]

> X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0]

> X-Note: This E-mail was sent from mx03.filter.theplanet.com

> ([207.218.221.229]).

>

> MIME element (text/plain)

> Dear sirs below an email sent in june of this year which was ignored.

> We now have these other email addresses so hopefully you will now

> co-operate and remove the offending postings. As we hadnt heard from

> you we have instructed US lawyers to act and they now tell us they

> have sufficient corporate information to instigate proceedings against

>

> you, which will now include a substantial damages claim. This is your

> last chance to respond positively and avoid this course of action. Wae

>

> await such confirmation from you by return.

>

> yours faithfully

>

> Colin Barr

> Heathcrest Legal Consultants

>

>

> Dear Sirs

>

> RE: DUBAI FORUMS

>

> We write to you on behalf of deVere & Partners / PIC in respect of

> postings over a number of weeks on your postings site relating to PIC

> and deVere.

>

> Although deVere & Partners / PIC are a Global Company it is owned by

> British Nationals.  We understand you are located in the USA and 
> subject

> therefore to USA law. We are putting you on notice that unless you 
> deal

> with the matters listed below and remove ALL postings and keep such

> postings off your web site, we will seek to take action against you in

> the USA for damages in respect of loss of reputation from falsehoods 
> and

> accusations in these postings leading to a clear loss of business and

> profits.

>

> 1. It started with a posting on 4th March 2005 3.34pm and the thread

> continued until May 2006.

>

> 2.  The postings bring into question our independence.  We are

> independent and are fully regulated by the UAE Central Bank (which you

> can easily check on the UAE Central Bank website).

>

> 3. The postings clearly accuse PIC/deVere of illegal acts, not being

> independent etc.  All are untrue and are libelous.

>

> 4. The threads also refer towards the end to such threads being 
> removed

> from ?Expatica site?, Wall Street Dex etc.  This is because it is the

> same disgruntled person using any site he/she can access to libel the

> Company.  These other sites have seen this and have agreed to remove 
> the

> thread.  We assume you will agree under these circumstances to remove

> the thread.  If such agreement is not forthcoming, we will as said 
> have

> no alternative but to seek to take action against you in the USA for

> damages but will also seek to have your site barred in the UAE due to

> its libelous content.

>

> 5. We are sure you agree that if anybody genuinely had such complaints

> they should be made to the appropriate authority of the country in 
> which

> they reside or in which they conducted business with deVere/PIC.

>     It may be of interest to you that no such action has been taken

> anywhere in Dubai or anywhere else we trade.

>

> Your response is awaited within the next 7 days.

>

> Yours faithfully

> Colin Barr

> Head Legal Consultant

> Heathcrest Legal Consultants Ltd

> PS.  This letter has been sent by courier on headed paper

>

>

>

>

> ----- End forwarded message -----

>

>

>

> ----- End forwarded message -----

>

>

>

>

>









----- End forwarded message -----

























----- End forwarded message -----
